pages.text: Hiding in the darkness are many scary, hungry creatures. Each of them have their own strengths and abilities, so take precautions before wandering.
pages.title: Mobs

pages.text: All hostile creatures in the $(thing)Abyss$() can drop $(thing)Nightmare Flakes$(). This item is used for most abyssal crafting and imbuing, so don't leave any behind!
pages.title: Nightmare Flakes

The real horrors of the darkness, the $(thing)Abyss$() is home to two fearsome monsters, ready to claim another victim.
pages.title: Bosses

pages.text: This dark book obtained from an empowered $(thing)Web Reaper$() can be used to summon $(thing)Shadowlord$() at a $(thing)Shadowlord Altar$() on a $(l:aoa3:abyss_structures#shadowlord_platform)Shadowlord Platform$(/l).
pages.title: Book of Shadows

pages.text: A mysterious eye harvested from the red-eyed tentacles around the $(thing)Abyss$(), it summons the $(thing)Elusive$() if used on an $(thing)Illusion Altar$() at a $(l:aoa3:abyss_structures#illusion_tree)Illusion Tree$(/l).
pages.title: Staring Eye
